overview: Cassidy Klein invites her three best female friends and their significant others over for a weekend of fun, conversation, and sensation. As festivities peak, she has all the girls play a sexy new game. She tosses the names of all the men into a bowl, and has each girl pick one at random to seduce before the weekend is over, and things turn into a love fest of beautiful, young hot bodies getting seductively entangled.
title: Swingers Getaway 2
